content: EPPE UPDATE: 🚀Exciting news! I've taken the reins as the new owner of this incredible project, and I can't wait to dive headfirst into the EPPE community! The previous owner is absolutely thrilled, and they're rooting for this project to flourish while ensuring everyone has a blast along the way!Hold onto your seats because here's the deal: The core framework and max supply (an impressive 3,180,000 EPPE) remain unchanged, along with the rock-solid HMQ1725 algorithm - for now!But guess what? I'm not just sitting around twiddling my thumbs. No way! I'm currently working tirelessly behind the scenes to set up a game-changing DEX, and trust me, the updates are coming in hot!But that's not all. Drumroll, please... 🥁Introducing the EPPE Discord server! 🎉 We're turning up the excitement with classic guessing games where you can win EPPE tokens and join the fun!Discord: https://discord.gg/pGkrqMektsGet ready to embark on this EPPE adventure like never before. The future is bright, and we're blazing a trail to success together! 🌟Website: https://peppercore.net/Github: https://github.com/pepperscore-project/pepperscore_v2/releasesBlock Explorers: https://explorer.peppercore.net/WalletsWindows QT: https[Suspicious link removed]Linux QT: https://github.com/pepperscore-project/pepperscore_v2/releases/download/v.1.1.0.1/Pepperscore-qtSnapshot: https://peppercore.net/storage/Snapshot.peeperscore.zipExchangeNonkyc: https://nonkyc.io/market/EPPE_BTC             https://nonkyc.io/market/EPPE_USDTStatisticsMiningPoolStats: https://miningpoolstats.stream/pepperscoreSocial LinksDiscord:  https://discord.gg/pGkrqMektsTwitter:  https://twitter.com/PEppe48878Telegram:  https://t.me/EPPE_pepperscoreMining PoolsLuckydogpool: https://luckydogpool.com/site/mining**Wallet sync nodes**addnode=1.30.174.201:37998addnode=140.213.142.225:37998addnode=161.97.142.60:37998addnode=176.57.189.38:37998addnode=62.171.138.11:37998addnode=78.57.248.53:37998addnode=207.244.243.35:37998addnode=84.39.241.122:37998

comments.author: taddymason
comments.body: Come by Discord and check out the new NFT contest:  https://discord.gg/WhWAchtJ Create a Sizzling Masterpiece - The Hot Pepper NFT Contest! Get ready to set the NFT world on fire with your artistic talent! We're on the hunt for the most visually stunning hot pepper NFT, and it could be YOURS.But that's not all! Just for participating, we're dishing out rewards like hotcakes. You'll receive an EPPE reward of 5 EPPE, just for joining in on the spicy fun. Now, here's where it gets really exciting. The grand prize goes to the creator of the most stunning pepper! Picture this: 30 EPPE tokens await the winner. That's not just a sprinkle of spice; that's a full-on flavor explosion! Hurry, though! This sizzling competition is blazing through the end of the month. Don't miss your chance to turn up the heat and show us what you've got. Let's make some NFT magic!

comments.body: WARNING MINERS  AND HOLDERS!Most of previous EPPE miners losted all of their mined coins!.I mined about 1200 EPPE version 1 and when contact to new discord channel to claim recover my mined coins. Result ---> No solution and mined coins lossed.In my case, no solution, channel bann and coins lossed.Several miners and holders of EPPE 1 coin have lost their coins!

comments.body: Sorry the former owner couldn't make you aware of the swap.Also sorry you did not check discord or here before.Keep crying about it which will for sure make the coins NOT appear.Just another baby that wants everything their way, sorry not sorry.

comments.author: vasia1917
comments.body: I could not even think that it was so easy to deceive the miners.Do you realize that you are setting a precedent for cheating in your project?You have taken about 50% of the mined issue of the coin. That is, you deceived not just a few participants in the EPPE project, but half of the coin holders.And then they deleted our messages from discord and banned us.I don't know how this can be explained, if not a scam???Maybe, you know?Here is a great video about our problem.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dE5Ly8zIQKE
